briefTitle: Effects of a Videogame-based Program on Women With Lymphedema Secondary to Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Effects of a Videogame-based Program on Women With Lymphedema Secondary to Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Be over 18 years
* Have a diagnosis of lymphedema, secondary to breast cancer

Exclusion Criteria:

* Stage 0 or subclinical lymphedema
* Present other shoulder pathology apart from lymphedema
